message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CL 

The paper deals with reinforcement learning in continuous state spaces, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The focus on safety constraints and risk management also suggests a connection to robotics and control theory (cs.RO, cs.SY). Finally, the two simulated applications mentioned in the abstract - spoken dialogue and autonomous driving - suggest a potential connection to natural language processing (cs.CL).
